text:
Diane Clare Oxberry (13 August 1967 – 10 January 2019) was an English broadcaster and weather presenter for the BBC regional news programme "North West Tonight". She also the regional current affairs programme "Inside Out North West".
Oxberry was born in Sunderland, County Durham, England. Oxberry was last on-air on "North West Tonight" in mid-December 2018.
Oxberry died at a hospital in Manchester on 10 January 2019 from pancreatic cancer, aged 51.
